author: Al Jazeera
title: Indonesia bans end of Ramadan exodus amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Millions normally return home at the end of the fasting month, but government says that cannot happen this year.
content:
Indonesia has decided to ban "mudik", the annual exodus that usually takes place at the end of Ramadan as people return home to their villages across the archipelago, in an attempt to curb the spread of the coronavirus in the Southeast Asian nation.
